title: About us
text: Elegant Beauty Studio is a team that strives to offer the best solutions to those who need us. We believe in an individual approach and high quality standards to help you achieve your goals. Studying at the Moscow School of Esthetics enriched me not only with knowledge, but also with a deep understanding of culture and traditions. This has become an important part of my professional and personal path. I opened my studio because I faced the problem of acne with my daughter. This experience was very difficult for us, and I realized how important it is to have access to quality support. Having completed the qualification in the New York Pro Acne program with specialists from Russia, Belarus, America gave me the opportunity to approach this issue in a qualified manner. Now my goal is to help other people going through similar difficulties.
